name: Scene
description:
Container for all SceneChild.
The main purpose is to manage the drawing order and update the child buffers

properties.name: center
properties.description: Refers to the central point of the scene

properties.name: height
properties.description: Logical number, the drawer will take care of defining the unit of measure

properties.name: width
properties.description: Logical number, the drawer will take care of defining the unit of measure

methods.name: add
methods.description: Add SceneChild to Scene, pass `order` as last parameter for drawing priorities

methods.name: find
methods.description: Find sceneChild from id or name in the whole scene

methods.name: getParentsOfSceneChild
methods.description: Returns the list of sceneChild hierarchy starting from the scene

methods.name: isFirstLevelChild
methods.description: Return true if sceneChild is direct children

methods.name: removeFromId
methods.description: Remove sceneChild by id or name

methods.name: stream
methods.description: Traverse the child buffer and use it with callback

methods.name: update
methods.description: Update all children, generate a streamable buffer for drawing

methods.name: getParentsOfSceneChild
methods.description: Returns the list of sceneChild hierarchy starting from the scene

name: SceneChild
description: The element to be added into a scene. Preserve props, drawing order, generate and return buffers. The only implementations of this class are Group and ShapeBase

properties.name: order
properties.description: The number that refers to the drawinf order

properties.name: scene
properties.description: Reference of the scene to which it is attached

methods.name: find
methods.description:
Find this or form or children.
Overridden by classes that extend it

methods.name: generate
methods.description: Generate shape. Best explained in ShapeBase

methods.name: getBuffer
methods.description: Return buffer of vertext if is generated

methods.name: getProp
methods.description: Return a sceneChild prop or default value

methods.name: isStatic
methods.description: With this method it is possible to check if the buffer will be generated at each update

methods.name: isStaticIndexed
methods.description: With this method you can check if the streaming buffer will be generated at each update

methods.name: setProp
methods.description: Set a single or multiple props and clear buffer if shape vertex depends from prop

methods.name: setPropUnsafe
methods.description: Set a single or multiple props

methods.name: stream
methods.description:
Stream shape
Best explained in ShapeBase

name: Group
description: A SceneChild container, propagates properties to children

methods.name: find
methods.description: Find scene child from id or name

methods.name: getBuffer
methods.description: return a single buffer binded from children

methods.name: getIndexedBuffer
methods.description: return a single buffer binded from children

methods.name: isStaticIndexed
methods.description: Check group has static children indexed

methods.name: setProp
methods.description: Set a single or multiple props

methods.name: setPropUnsafe
methods.description: Set a single or multiple props

name: ShapeBase
description: Main class for shape generation

properties.name: bUseParent
properties.description:
With this parameter the shape will be created at each repetition,
useful if you want to encapsulate this shape in another and use its <mark>repetition</mark> object.
In the case of ShapePrimitive the style prop don't need to as they are generated during the buffer stream.

properties.name: bUseRecursion
properties.description:
With this parameter the shape will be created at each recursion,
In the case of ShapePrimitive style prop don't need to as they are generated during the buffer stream.

properties.name: vertexCallback
properties.description: Callback to apply transform at any vertex

methods.name: generate
methods.description: Update the vertex array if the shape is not static and update the indexedBuffer if it is also not static

methods.name: generateBuffer
methods.description: Return a buffer of children shape or loop generated buffer

methods.name: isStatic
methods.description: Check if the shape should be generated every time

methods.name: isStaticIndexed
methods.description:
Check if the indexedBuffer array needs to be recreated every time,
this can happen when a shape generates an array of vertices different in length at each repetition

methods.name: setProp
methods.description: Set a single or multiple props

name: ERepetitionType
description: Repetition type enumerator.

members.name: Ring
members.description:
Defines the type of repetition of the shape,
in a circular way starting from the center of the scene

members.name: Matrix
members.description:
Defines the type of repetition of the shape,
on a nxm grid starting from the center of the scene

members.name: Scale
members.description: The buffer is scaled in a range between [-1, -1] and [1,1]

members.name: Center
members.description: The buffer is scaled in a range between [-1, -1] and [1,1] and is centered

members.name: Fill
members.description: The buffer is adapted centrally and expanded in a range between [-1, -1] and [1,1]

name: IBaseRepetition
description: Base repetition

properties.name: index
properties.description: Index of repetition, from 1 to count

properties.name: offset
properties.description: Current repetition offset from 0 (first repetition) to 1 (last repetition)

name: IBufferIndex
description: Object for index the buffer

name: ILissajousProps
description: For wx, wy and wx see Lissajous on Wikipedia

properties.name: sideLength
properties.description: scalar that multiplies the buffer or loop

properties.name: repetitions
properties.description:
It defines the type of repetition.
If a number is passed the repetition will be Ring.
If an array (1) is passed the repetition will be nxn,
if an array (2) the repetition will be mxn [rows x columns]

properties.name: distance
properties.description:
If the repeat is Ring, pass a numerical value
referring to the distance from the center.
If the repeat is Matrix, pass an array (2) which refers
to the distance between columns and rows.

properties.name: displace
properties.description: For Ring repeats, define the starting angle of the repeat

name: ILissajousSettings
description: http://paulbourke.net/geometry/supershape/

properties.name: loopDependencies
properties.description:
Array of properties on which shapeloop generation depends,
for example the circle varies the number of points based on the radius (sideLength)

properties.name: sideLength
properties.description: scalar that multiplies the buffer or loop

properties.name: adaptMode
properties.description: Adapt buffer mode, see EShapePrimitiveAdaptMode for more details

properties.name: bClosed
properties.description: Callback to apply transform at any vertex

properties.name: bUseParent
properties.description:
With this parameter the shape will be created at each repetition,
useful if you want to encapsulate this shape in another and use its <mark>repetition</mark> object.
In the case of ShapePrimitive style prop don't need to as they are generated during the buffer stream.

properties.name: bUseRecursion
properties.description: If container is SHapeRecursive, will this parameter the shape will be created at each recursion,

properties.name: vertexCallback
properties.description: Callback to apply transform at any vertex

if an array (2) the repetition will be mxn [rows x columns]

referring to the distance from the center.
If the repeat is Matrix, pass an array (2) which refers
to the distance between columns and rows.

properties.name: displace
properties.description: For Ring repeats, define the starting angle of the repeat

name: IRepetition
description: Information about propArguments repetition

properties.name: index
properties.description: Index of repetition, from 1 to count

properties.name: offset
properties.description: Current repetition offset from 0 (first repetition) to 1 (last repetition)

properties.name: angle
properties.description: angle of current repetition, from 0 to Math.PI * 2

properties.name: row
properties.description: Information about rows of matrix repetition

properties.name: col
properties.description: Information about columns of matrix repetition

name: IStreamArguments
description:
Object passed to the drawer where it is possible to draw the current frame
starting from frameBufferIndex up to frameBuffeIndex + frameLength,
the fill or strtoke color of the frame is also present

properties.description: scalar that multiplies the buffer or loop

If the repeat is Ring, pass a numerical value
referring to the distance from the center.
If the repeat is Matrix, pass an array (2) which refers
to the distance between columns and rows.

properties.name: displace
properties.description: For Ring repeats, define the starting angle of the repeat

name: TSceneChildProp
description: Value or callable

name: TVertexCallback
description: Callback to pass at vertextCallback property

parameter.name: TVertexCallback
parameter.description: Callback to pass at vertextCallback property

name: angle2FromRepetition
description:
Return angle (atan2, 4 quadrants) from offset (or center) for matrix repetition.
Offset is array between [-1, -1] and [1, 1].
The return value is between -Math.PI an Math.PI

name: angleFromRepetition
description:
Return angle (atan) from offset (or center) for matrix repetition.
Offset is array between [-1, -1] and [1, 1].
The return value is between -Math.PI / 2 and Math.PI / 2

name: clamp
description: Return number between min and max

name: distanceFromRepetition
description:
Return distance from offset (or center) for matrix repetition.
The return value is between 0 and 1

name: lerp
description: Linear interpolation from `a` when `i` as 0 an `b` when `i' as 1

name: noise
description: SimplexNoise Use 'random' as seed property for random seed. Return value between -1 and 1

name: now
description: Get current timestamp in milliseconds

name: relativeClamp
description: Map number between refMin e refMax from min and max

name: toDegrees
description: Convert number from radians to degrees

name: toRadians
description: Convert angle from degrees to radians

name: log
description: Return logarith value and base

name: pmod
description: Return a positive module of positive or negative value

name: Shape
description: Container of ShapeBase or Group, it applies transformations on each repetition

methods.name: find
methods.description: Find shape by id or name

methods.name: generateBuffer
methods.description: Return a buffer of children shape or loop generated buffer

methods.name: isStaticIndexed
methods.description: Check if shape has static index

methods.name: bindBuffer
methods.description: Apply sideLength on <mark>.shape</mark> buffer and calculate bounding

methods.name: generateBuffer
methods.description: Return a buffer of children shape or loop generated buffer

name: ShapeLoop
description: Shape Loop

properties.name: bStaticLoop
properties.description: chek if loop generate a static shape

properties.name: currentOrSingleLoopBuffer
properties.description:
Generate static loop buffer whem IShapeLoopGenerator props
haven't dynamic properties

properties.name: loopDependencies
properties.description: list of prop has impact on shape loop generation

methods.name: generateBuffer
methods.description: Return a buffer of children shape or loop generated buffer

methods.name: getLoop
methods.description: Return information about a client loop gnerator

methods.name: isStaticIndexed
methods.description: Check if shape has static indexed

properties.name: adaptMode
properties.description: Adapt buffer mode, see EShapePrimitiveAdaptMode for more details

properties.name: bClosed
properties.description: Define shape is closed, default true

properties.name: currentGenerationPrimitiveBounding
properties.description: Contain the bounding of the last generated buffer

methods.name: getShapeBounding
methods.description: Return a bounding of generated buffer if is direct scene child

properties.name: currentGenerationRecursiveBounding
properties.description: Contain the bounding of the last generated buffer

methods.name: generateBuffer
methods.description: Return a buffer of children shape with recursion

description: Lissajous shape

description: Polygon shape

name: SuperShape
description: ShperShape

name: Triangle
description: Triangle ShapeBuffer

name: ISceneSettings
description: The object to pass as the argument of a new scene

name: ERepetitionType
description: Repetition type enumerator.

members.name: Ring
members.description:
Defines the type of repetition of the shape,
in a circular way starting from the center of the scene

members.name: Matrix
members.description:
Defines the type of repetition of the shape,
on a nxm grid starting from the center of the scene

name: IBaseRepetition
description: Base repetition

properties.name: index
properties.description: Index of repetition, from 1 to count

properties.name: offset
properties.description: Current repetition offset from 0 (first repetition) to 1 (last repetition)

properties.name: index
properties.description: Index of repetition, from 1 to count

properties.name: offset
properties.description: Current repetition offset from 0 (first repetition) to 1 (last repetition)

name: IRepetition
description: Information about propArguments repetition

properties.name: index
properties.description: Index of repetition, from 1 to count

properties.name: offset
properties.description: Current repetition offset from 0 (first repetition) to 1 (last repetition)

properties.name: angle
properties.description: angle of current repetition, from 0 to Math.PI * 2

properties.name: row
properties.description: Information about rows of matrix repetition

properties.name: col
properties.description: Information about columns of matrix repetition

name: ISceneChildPropArguments
description: Object argument for sceneChild props

properties.name: recursion
properties.description: Information about recursion (if is encapsulated in a ShapeRecursive)

name: ISceneChildProps
description:
Props interface.
Remember: any size refere to dimension of a scene.

properties.name: repetitions
properties.description:
It defines the type of repetition.
If a number is passed the repetition will be Ring.
If an array (1) is passed the repetition will be nxn,
if an array (2) the repetition will be mxn [rows x columns]

properties.name: distance
properties.description:
If the repeat is Ring, pass a numerical value
referring to the distance from the center.
If the repeat is Matrix, pass an array (2) which refers
to the distance between columns and rows.

properties.name: displace
properties.description: For Ring repeats, define the starting angle of the repeat

properties.description: Current repetition offset from 0 (first repetition) to 1 (last repetition)

name: IStreamArguments
description:
Object passed to the drawer where it is possible to draw the current frame
starting from frameBufferIndex up to frameBuffeIndex + frameLength,
the fill or strtoke color of the frame is also present

name: TSceneChildProp
description: Value or callable

members.name: Scale
members.description: The buffer is scaled in a range between [-1, -1] and [1,1]

members.name: Center
members.description: The buffer is scaled in a range between [-1, -1] and [1,1] and is centered

members.name: Fill
members.description: The buffer is adapted centrally and expanded in a range between [-1, -1] and [1,1]

name: IBufferIndex
description: Object for index the buffer

name: IParentBufferIndex
description: Parent object for index the buffer

name: IShapeBaseSettings
description: ShapeBaseSettings

properties.name: bUseParent
properties.description:
With this parameter the shape will be created at each repetition,
useful if you want to encapsulate this shape in another and use its <mark>repetition</mark> object.
In the case of ShapePrimitive style prop don't need to as they are generated during the buffer stream.

properties.name: bUseRecursion
properties.description: If container is SHapeRecursive, will this parameter the shape will be created at each recursion,

If the repeat is Matrix, pass an array (2) which refers
to the distance between columns and rows.

properties.name: displace
properties.description: For Ring repeats, define the starting angle of the repeat
